content.heading: HTML Links
paragraphs: Hyperlinks enable navigation across web pages, appearing on most websites.

content.heading: Link Syntax
paragraphs: The tag creates a hyperlink with the href attribute specifying the destination: Visit Example!
Links are blue (unvisited), purple (visited), or red (active) by default and underlined. CSS can customize their look.
